DOC.brief_title: Effects Supradyn® Energy 3RDA Fatigue/Stress , Substrate Metabolism During Exercise Demanding Cognitive Tasks
DOC.detailed_description: Supplementation vitamin mineral show enhance energy production , metabolism , mood state . It think may also aid recovery challenge physical psychological task follow acute chronic supplementation . The present study investigate effect multivitamin/mineral supplement ( Supradyn® Energy 3RDA ) follow single intake follow daily intake 4-weeks subjective rating 'fatigue/stress ' , metabolism blood biomarkers cell damage follow exercise demand cognitive task , healthy young male female volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Subjects physically active ( i.e . exercise least 2 time per week ) Subjects able run nonstop treadmill moderate pace 30mins Subjects agree abstain throughout trial dietary vitamin mineral supplement Subjects , opinion investigator , willing participate schedule visit adhere study procedure Subjects accept refrain alcohol intake 24 hour fast minimum 10 hour study visit Subjects current diagnosis significant medical condition may interfere subject 's ability perform assessment successfully complete train Subjects provide personally sign date informed consent indicate subject inform pertinent aspects trial understood accepts Have bank account ( required payment ) Smokers ( smoke within last 3 month ) Blood pressure > 140/90mmHg Excessive use caffeine ( > 500 mg caffeine per day ) dietary source Current intake pharmaceutical ( exclude contraception ) Have recent history ( within 12 month screen visit ) strong potential alcohol substance abuse . Alcohol abuse define 60g ( men ) / 40g ( woman ) pure alcohol per day ( 7 / 5.5 unit ) A history neurological psychiatric disease exclude anxiety depression Current diagnosis depression anxiety A history significant head trauma Have sleep disturbance and/or take sleep aid medication Have learn difficulty dyslexia Have visual impairment correct glass contact lens Have frequent migraine require medication ( equal 1 per month ) Have disorder blood ( e.g . anemia , hemophilia , thrombocytosis ) Have heart disorder history vascular illness Have respiratory disorder induce exercise require regular medication ( Note : participant asthma take medication occasionally/as require eligible study ) Have type I type II diabetes Have history renal hepatic disease , severe diseases gastrointestinal tract ( e.g . iron accumulation , iron utilization disorder , hypercalcaemia , hypercalciuria ) , likely interfere metabolism/absorption/secretion product investigation Are pregnant , try get pregnant breast feed Have health condition would prevent fulfillment study requirement Any condition may interfere subject ability perform assessment Are employ job include night shift work Participation another clinical trial within 30 day prior screen Have habitually supplement vitamin mineral , within last month ( define 3 consecutive day 4 day total ) BMI 30 kg/m2 Any history hypersensitivity investigational product active inactive constituent food allergy intolerance
